name: one-shot-sheriff
description:
This year we weren't able to participate in the GMTK game jam, but we liked the theme, so we made a jam game on our own time.

The theme was "Only One", the idea is to take something a game usually has more of, and make a game where you have only one.

The goal in this game is to shoot all the bad guys. If you fail, you lose even if you survive.

Download and play:

On Windows or Macos download the .zip

On any other platform all you need is love (https://love2d.org/) (v 11.2), and the one-shot-sheriff.love file
